item.title: The contraction property on weak normalization and relative Lipschitz saturation of algebras
item.description: arXiv:2410.18942v3 Announce Type: replace Abstract: Inspired by the results obtained in \cite{SR}, in this work, we develop techniques to handle the contraction property for weak normalization and Lipschitz saturation of algebras for the following types of algebras: universally injective, integral, radicial, and unramified.
item.dc:creator: Thiago da Silva
